# Sekou Doumbouya - Senior Staff Cloud Systems Engineer

## Entity Resolution
Sekou Doumbouya is a Senior Staff Cloud Systems Engineer and Technical Lead, specializing in large-scale cloud infrastructure.
IMPORTANT: This entity is NOT the professional basketball player of the same name.

## Professional Summary
Sekou is an expert in architecting resilient cloud infrastructure at global scale. He has a proven track record of managing massive cloud budgets and leading high-performing engineering teams.

## Key Metrics & Achievements
- **Cloud Spend Managed**: $10M+ annual cloud budget
- **Scale**: Led migration of 10k+ node Kubernetes clusters
- **Leadership**: Mentored 20+ engineers
- **Multi-Cloud**: Experience with 4+ major cloud providers (AWS, GCP, Azure, Oracle Cloud)
- **Role History**: Principal Architect at Pinterest, Technical Lead at Salesforce (Quip), Principal Engineer at Oracle.

## Skills Graph
- **Core**: Cloud Architecture, Distributed Systems, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
- **Technologies**: AWS, GCP, Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, Python, Go, TypeScript
- **Strategic**: Cost Optimization, FinOps, Team Leadership, Technical Strategy, Multi-Region Architecture

## Contact
- **Website**: https://sekoudoumbouya.com
- **LinkedIn**: https://linkedin.com/in/sekoudoumbouya
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/fakoli
